titleStmt.title: A sermon deliuered in Oxford Concerning the Apostles preaching and ours. By Richard Iames Bachelor of Diuinitie, and fellow of C.C.C. in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: James, Richard, 1592-1638.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansby, for Nathaniel Butter,

notesStmt.note: "A sermon deliuered in Oxford. Concerning the obseruation of Lent-fast" has separate dated title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
